sections.heading: Parties; how designated.In all civil actions, the complaining party shall be known as the plaintiff and the adverse party as the defendant
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 3, p. 394;R.S.1913, § 7561;C.S.1922, § 8504;C.S.1929, § 20-102;R.S.1943, § 25-102.AnnotationsDesignation of party appealing as plaintiff i
